column5: Heading up in a week and wondering if anyone has any recent reports from the Deception Bay/ Sen Bay area of Lac Seul?
Wondering if Ben or Colin have been fishing the Deception Bay/Sen Bay area?
Only for muskie in that area. I find if you travel farther north, Taylor island and beyond, you will more than double your walleye production compared to Deception area.

I would have to agree with Ben, the waters are the warmest they've been in a long time up here. Go north to find humps and points in the main basin. Bigger, deeper, cooler waters. Walleye fishing has been incredible everyday up there, well worth the run!
